name: Perfect Teams
storyline:
Assemble your team and write your story!

Help the innkeeper or go your own way to directly defeat a huge troll or face a princess who is not so charming.

Perfect Teams mixes several styles between medieval fantasy and futuristic world, discover different biomes with incredible stories in the course of your journey.

Thanks to the deck concept, your characters evolve over time. Your victories will allow you to unlock cards and improve your team.

The characters in the game all have their own distinct and original personalities. The choice of your team will be eclectic and each person brings a lot to the other.

The role-playing aspect of the game will allow you to make good and bad choices. You are therefore in control of your story according to what you want to do!

Will you pass your way in front of bandits in a forest?

Be brave and face the evil with your perfect team!
summary: Perfect Teams is a Rogue Like deckbuilder in which you have to assemble a team of three characters, each one with unique cards and unique powers, to explore different universes and fight the corruption caused by the fusion. What will be your Perfect Team?
